message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this valuable product to you today. I think it would be perfect for you. Given its value, I'm offering it at a starting price of $20,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can't commit to such a high price. Would it be possible for you to consider $17,000 as a fair price?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your perspective. While $20,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $18,500?
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget constraints, could we discuss a price closer to $16,500?
